function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of trust in government initiatives","Impact":"Difficulty in achieving objectives","Mitigation":"Increase transparency and communication from the government","Technologies":"Online platforms for information dissemination","People":"Citizens","Owner":"Government, communication agencies, community leaders"},{"Description":"Inadequate community engagement","Impact":"Ineffective emergency plans and implementation","Mitigation":"Empower community-based organizations, enhance communication channels","Technologies":"Digital platforms for community engagement","People":"Local residents, vulnerable groups","Owner":"Local governments, NGOs, community-based organizations"},{"Description":"Failure of state-centric initiatives","Impact":"Lack of proper response to emergencies","Mitigation":"Strengthen Non-Governmental Organizations (NGOs), promote community-driven activities","Technologies":"Digital platforms for coordinating NGO activities","People":"Vulnerable groups, citizens","Owner":"NGOs, local governments"}]}
